mapper.select: select rownum as rnum, n.* from (select camp_no as campNo, camp_name as campName, camp_addr as campAddr, member_no as memberNo, camp_show as campShow, camp_type as campType, camp_ph as campPh, camp_period as campPeriod, camp_day as campDay, camp_facility as campFacility, camp_fee_ori_day as campFeeOriDay, camp_fee_ori_end as campFeeOriEnd, camp_fee_peak_day as campFeePeakDay, camp_fee_peak_end as campFeePeakEnd from camp order by 1 desc) n
